cibs.gun.ak105_kaltsit.desc: §aThe fact that I am here, Doctor, shows that the situation is not optimistic. You need to be attentive...... Keep up with your mission.———Kal'tsit
cibs.gun.ak24_texas.desc: §fCodenamed Texas, its functions include vehicle driving, cargo handling, and personnel safety. Keep the description of the task as simple as possible. ———Texas
cibs.gun.type20_hibiki.desc: I'm HIBIKI, and my activity lives up to the name of the immortal bird ———HIBIKI
cibs.gun.mk18_jianjiu.desc: §9I'm ready, it's time to get down to business———JIANJIU
cibs.gun.sig556_shiroko.desc: §3The more prepared you are, the better. It's a simple rule. ———Sunaookami Shiroko
cibs.gun.m4_koei.desc: §cClumsy Little Wolf is ready for battle!
cibs.gun.galilace_lesh.desc: §9I have made up my mind———LESHUAN_20(The author put himself in a gun pack)
cibs.cib_printer_skin.desc: §eCIB,Fight the hardships before setting off again
